Makes sense. The mother was too damaged to keep, especially for a shy and inexperienced son. He did the right thing by not making a move even if commenters here pretend otherwise. As a result, he's is going to college and doing well while she is happy with the teacher. This is as close to win-win as I've ever seen in a proper NTR story. New GF is irrelevant because he could just get another GF later.  Win-win.

Part 4 - Yuki had been suspicious of his girlfriend because lately she never responded his calls. He was depressed and startEd remembering his stepmom. One day Yuki went to look up if his stepmom had uploaded any new av. But there he saw his girlfriend getting pounded by some douche. Without realizing Yuki started to jerk. With tears in his eyes.
Next day yuki went to his father. To ask him to get him a new stepmom. But he found his dad on the floor (dead) which his limp dick  in his hand. (Apparently he was waiting for his wife'snew av but instead saw yukis girlfriend getting pounded he got a stroke and died). Yuki saw his dad's PC with his girlfriends av open he was shocked and looked more through the page he saw Another video of a woman which looked like his mother. After realizing everything h
That happened between his father and mother Yuki couldn't take it and hung himself in the same room. THE END I really had nothing to do so why not become a author. Lol

Chapter 4 part 2 - Yuki has been having sex with his girlfriend every day. But he always went limp during sex. Yuki had been jacking off to his stepmoms last video the teacher mailed in which she told how she wanted yuki but he'd never go for it. Still not realizing his feelings yuki always said to himself that he loved his girlfriend and was happy to have her. 

Mean while Yuki's Girlfriend-  Yuki's Girlfriend was frustrated sexually because Yuki never pounded her like the teacher. So she started to cheat on Yuki with some douche. The douche was the same douche that yukis mom ran away with. He fucked her like crazy which resulted in yukis Girlfriend becoming the douche's second bitch.

Chapter 4 Part 1 - Back story about yuki's mother : yuki's mother never died. She was cheating on his father with some douche. Yukis father caught an av of yuki's mother. But he was just like yuki. He got off with his tiny dick which suddenly was full of life. Just like that one day yuki's mother  ran away the douche. So the father had to bring a motherly woman for our young yuki even though he knew she was a whore. The father always stayed away from home because he had to fapp to his wife's av's.

After yuki's father got to know that the stepmom ran away. He looked up her av's but she had stopped uploading. The last video was of her getting  poundedhw 
ihle she was knocked up. The father returned home. There yuki was with his girlfriend. The father realized yuki was grown up and didn't need a stepmom anymore so he went back.
Seems like a happy ending
